attributes.action: change the law to make it illegal and punishable with an automatic mandatory life means life prison sentence for anybody to remove or alter anything which is entered in the contemporaneous official record of parliamentary and other national government proceedings going on in this country in the name of the people of this country.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Recent events show that even the official records of statements by our politicians can be altered or removed, to suit their own ends, by the politicians in power at the time. It is absolutely vital that NOBODY is allowed to get away with perverting the accurate records of what goes on in the name of democracy in the House of Lords or the House of Commons.  Those who attempt to do so should know that they will forfeit their freedom until the day they die.

reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
